item.title: C
item.description: score:997 Chances: Citigroup Inc. (C) is experiencing growth in its Asia family office business, expecting a 25% increase in clients this year, driven by strong demand from wealthy individuals in Singapore and Hong Kong. The bank saw a significant increase in client numbers in 2022, indicating positive momentum in its family office advisory business in the Asian market.
